an6.39:1.3: Lobho nidanam kammanam samudayaya, doso nidanam kammanam samudayaya, moho nidanam kammanam samudayaya.
an6.39:1.5: atha kho, bhikkhave, lobha lobhova samudeti.
an6.39:1.7: atha kho, bhikkhave, dosa dosova samudeti.
an6.39:1.9: atha kho, bhikkhave, moha mohova samudeti.
an6.39:1.10: Na, bhikkhave, lobhajena kammena dosajena kammena mohajena kammena deva pannayanti, manussa pannayanti, ya va panannapi kaci sugatiyo.
an6.39:1.11: Atha kho, bhikkhave, lobhajena kammena dosajena kammena mohajena kammena nirayo pannayati tiracchanayoni pannayati pettivisayo pannayati, ya va panannapi kaci duggatiyo.
an6.39:1.12: Imani kho, bhikkhave, tini nidanani kammanam samudayaya.
an6.39:2.3: Alobho nidanam kammanam samudayaya, adoso nidanam kammanam samudayaya, amoho nidanam kammanam samudayaya.
an6.39:2.5: atha kho, bhikkhave, alobha alobhova samudeti.
an6.39:2.7: atha kho, bhikkhave, adosa adosova samudeti.
an6.39:2.9: atha kho, bhikkhave, amoha amohova samudeti.
an6.39:2.10: Na, bhikkhave, alobhajena kammena adosajena kammena amohajena kammena nirayo pannayati tiracchanayoni pannayati pettivisayo pannayati, ya va panannapi kaci duggatiyo.
an6.39:2.11: Atha kho, bhikkhave, alobhajena kammena adosajena kammena amohajena kammena deva pannayanti, manussa pannayanti, ya va panannapi kaci sugatiyo.
an6.39:2.12: Imani kho, bhikkhave, tini nidanani kammanam samudayaya”ti.
